snippet.title: Goofy Training, going to gobble up the miles and a lot of ...‎
snippet.description: So as your eating your leftover turkey think of me as I am out an about. Speaking of left over turkey, I am going to try this recipe this year:

snippet.title: Ask the Directory Services Team : mail sack‎
snippet.description: ... but it just sounds like a recipe to get things wrong or end up replicating things twice, making it worse.
